how_do_i_access_my_different_payment_met: How do I access my different payment methods?

You can view your different payment methods by going in to your account section and selection payment methods. If you wish to add a new payment method, you can do this when paying for your items in your basket.
how_do_i_change_my_personal_details_head: How do I change my personal details?
how_do_i_change_my_personal_details_para: To modify your delivery address, navigate to the account section where you can access your personal information. This includes payment methods and saved addresses as well.
how_do_i_manage_my_subscription_heading: How do I manage my subscription?
how_do_i_manage_my_subscription_paragrap: You can manage your subscription by going to your account. Here you will be able to see the details of your chosen subscription.
how_do_i_return_an_item_heading: How do I return an item?
how_do_i_return_an_item_paragraph:
We are working on a returns system that is as convenient as our delivery system. Meanwhile, returns will be handled according to the specific policies of each brand/store. Please visit their returns page to check more details on refund information and send us an email to team@nift.london including the following information:

Order Number
Order Date
Name

Please then follow the instructions provided by the brand/store.
invalid_auth_token_error_message: Invalid authentication token returned from the server.

invite_a_friend_promo_message: We'll give you both £3 off of your next three deliveries

issues_with_a_delivery_or_rider_heading: Issues with a delivery or rider
just_click_on_the_link_in_that_email_to_: Just click on the link in that email to verify your email address. If you don’t see it you may need to check your spam folder

location_services_must_be_enabled: You must have location services enabled to use the app as a courier. Please enable this in your devices settings.
need_help_paragraph:
Need help? Click on our chat icon in the bottom right hand corner to begin a conversation with someone from the NIFT team.


Alternatively, you can email team@nift.london.


You might also find the information you are looking for in our FAQs below:

what_if_i_am_not_around_when_my_rider_ar: What if I’m not around when my rider arrives?

We ask that all customers are ready for their delivery riders arrival but in the rare case that you think you’re not going to be at your location at the time your delivery is estimated to be delivered then please contact us at team@nift.london.

If nobody answers the door at the delivery address, the rider will always try to contact you. The NIFT team will also try to contact you if the rider can’t get hold of you. 

If we can’t contact you, you will be charged a fee for your order so please keep an eye on your messages and phone to prevent this from happening.
what_if_my_order_is_late_heading: What if my order is late?
what_if_my_order_is_late_paragraph:
We aim to make all of our deliveries in under 2 hours, however, we understand that sometimes things can occur which is out of the riders control. Where we can, the NIFT team will always try to contact you to update you if your item isn’t going to be delivered within the estimated time and we will work hard to ensure your item gets delivered as safely and as quickly as possible.

Please contact us at team@nift.london if you are still experiencing problems with your order.
what_if_something_is_wrong_with_my_order: What if something is wrong with my order?

We have a great dedicated team that looks after your entire NIFT experience!

However, we understand that sometimes things can go wrong. In this case, you can click the message icon and fill out the form and one of our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

You can also contact us at team@nift.london.
what_is_a_nift_subscription_paragraph: By subscribing the NIFT, customers can pay a monthly fee of £23.99 to enjoy 4 complimentary deliveries each month, or opt for an annual fee of £149.99 to receive 5 deliveries per month for 12 months. Take advantage of the NIFT subscription to reduce delivery costs and save money!
